page.title: 19Burton Latimer -Buildings
page.content: PIONEER AVENUE.It runs west from the A6 trunk road & leads to the recreation ground.The houses were built circa 1945 Most houses have pebble dash walls & brick patterns round the windows &doors Most are terraced with some detatched & semidetached.Some belong to the Council All houses are surrounded by a fence or brick wall.The gardens are long & thin. QUEENSWAY.It is a new street to thewest of the town with houses built between 1960 & 1975.There are semidetatched bungalows & houses & 10 detatched bung- alows,brick built & wooden panelled. Most have shared drives & garages.Many windows are double glazed.Most houses have 2 external doors.The gardens are small and open to the front, and larger at the back.
